entry.title: Forgive Yourself by Letting Yourself Love (and letting yourself be loved)
entry.summary:
Author: aviationisthere

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 89,984Chapters: 19/?Kudos: 791

Summary: When Bruce arrived at the cave, the first thing he heard was yelling. That wasn’t unusual so he didn’t think anything was out of the ordinary. That was until he parked Nightwing’s bike in its spot and he saw his children. He saw his children. They were children. Young children. “What the...” Bruce pulled off the helmet. He got off the bike and set the helmet down before pulling off his cowl. He walked over to the batmobile which his kids were trying to climb out of. “Boys?”•OR just another batfam de-aging au because I love them and I wanted one that had all of my demands so I roped my friend Avian into helping me co-write one!

entry.title: Family of the Year...Because No One Else Entered the Contest
entry.summary:
Author: Eboni_A

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 98,833Chapters: 17/18Kudos: 403

Summary: Clark Kent and Bruce Wayne are officially married and the adoptive parents of five very active teenagers: Conner, 16, new to families and basic human interaction; Robin, 15, on his way to the Olympic Trials for the US Men’s Gymnastics Team; Jason, 14, a child star about to take on the biggest movie role of his career; Tim, 13, training to be more than a back-up hero; and Damian, 12, ready to step into his father’s work boots and cowl.With their time divided between Gotham and New York City, Clark and Bruce struggle to remain a sane, united front while drowning in the chaotic drama that is teenagers left to their own devices when Jason’s birth mother wants to become a permanent fixture in his life, Robin’s behavior becomes erratic after a celebration turns tragic, Tim fears the feelings he has for Conner, Conner doubts his acceptance into the family, and Talia Al Ghul threatens to visit.For some unions, love just isn’t enough to keep it all together. It’s Clark and Bruce against the world, but can they succeed, when it seems that even their own children are on the opposing side?

entry.title: Reasons
entry.summary:
Author: Nyszu

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,980Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 49

Summary: Bruce has never told Clark about his uncle Philip. He didn’t need to. He cut off contact a long time ago, and half of his children didn’t even know he existed.But of course, the day Clark and he celebrate their one-year anniversary, his uncle had to ruin the night and expose to Clark how broken Bruce was.It had lasted too long, Bruce thought. Of all the reasons Clark had to leave him, this one would surely be it.

entry.title: The Buttered Cat Paradox
entry.summary:
Author: writersagainstwritersblock

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,970Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 232

Summary: “No comment.”“You don’t know what I was going to ask,” Clark said with a hint of a smile. “Maybe I just wanted to congratulate you on catching the Film Freak.”Bruce gave him a flat look.“Or maybe I think I can help.”“With a case of vandalism?”Clark stepped in front of him. “It’s not vandalism and you know it, detective.”“And what makes you say that?”“If it were vandalism it would be something a lot more juvenile. To the point. It wouldn’t claim there were seventeen missing kids. That’s public outcry.”“Is that so?”“That and I tried to do a story on the growing number of homeless children last month and I got shut down. According to the last count, the numbers have been decreasing, but there’s been no change in policies, no extra funding to CPS, or shelters, or even an increase in the number of inmates in the juvenile detention center. So where are they going?” Detective Bruce Wayne may have the highest solve rate in Gotham, but if he wants to solve this case, he’ll need the help of an elusive street kid, and while Dick Grayson always lands on his feet, he usually lands himself right into trouble.

entry.title: The Phantom Robin
entry.summary:
Author: Scarletred1990

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,976Chapters: 27/?Kudos: 420

Summary: Danny wasn't a Fenton. He wasn't their original child, in fact, he was their nephew. A nephew they lied to. They thought they were helping him, but all it did was cause him to resent them. Cause him to run away. He needed to fix this mistake he unknowingly made.Dick wasn't a Wayne, but he liked pretending to be. It felt better than remembering that he was abandoned by someone he thought he could trust. Someone he thought would never leave his side. Someone who wasn't there for their deaths.Yet, they couldn't stay away from each other for too long. After all, they were two halves of the same whole.

entry.title: Multifaceted People
entry.summary:
Author: mustangisinflames

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,429Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 24

Summary: "Clark was three people wrapped in one: the nobody, the somebody, and the alien. All of them felt lonely, felt less than and ‘other’, and whilst Clark clung to the idea that the farm boy from Kansas, raised by the unconditional love of two people he would always consider to be his Ma and Pa, was his truest self, he couldn't help but wonder. Doubt. Become lost in the spaces between each name thrust upon him. No one really knew him, because he didn't really know himself. And even when he was surrounded by people, or in the quiet intimacy of Lois’ arms, that never really went away.Multifaceted but not whole. Just like Jor-El’s collection of crystals." Clark feels as Clark always feels - like an outsider. He at least gets an invitation to Bruce Wayne's latest gala.

Summary: Batman fights a new villain in Gotham's famous crime alley, only to be hit with a truth serum that lasts for a week, and Superman, oblivious enough to this, hears that his good FRIEND needs assistance, cue to him bringing (convincing) Batman to the watchtower for further testing and for Batman fighting the urge to shut the fuck up and try not to spill any of his obvious and undying love for the man of fucking steel.orBatman confesses to Superman in front of everyone in the JL and will probably cry about it to Alfred when he gets home.

entry.title: Tentacles of Love
entry.summary:
Author: LadyArkin

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 23,278Chapters: 7/10Kudos: 77

Summary: He wasn’t even offering much more than, “I need a favor, buddy.”Batman’s marriage proposal was sudden and…strategic.Once they’ve spent some time together, Batman talks Superman into marrying for a mission. A mission that Bruce declares to be entirely selfish which he needs for business purposes. This mission isn’t supposed to be impactful to either of their personal lives.It starts when Bruce releases pictures of Batman proposing to Superman. He didn’t need more than a distraction and if it hadn’t been for an intervention from their family and friends, it wouldn’t have been. The more involved their blended family gets into their relationship, the more that they are supported in their relationship.
